com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Interface PWMOutputController

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DeviceInterfaceModule

    public interface PWMOutputController
    Interface for working with PWM Input Controllers

    Different analog input controllers will implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

        void close()
        Close this device

      • setPulseWidthOutputTime

        void setPulseWidthOutputTime(int port,
                             int time)
        Sets the pulse width for the channel output in units of 1 microsecond. Setting a value greater than the output period will result in the output being permanently set to 1.
        Parameters:
        port - 0 or 1
        time - pulse width for the channel in microseconds.

      • setPulseWidthPeriod

        void setPulseWidthPeriod(int port,
                         int period)
        Sets the pulse repetition period for the channel output in units of 1 microsecond. If the pwm feature is being used to generate pulses for a standard R/C style servo, the output period should be set to 20,000 and the output on time should be set within the range 750-2,250.
        Parameters:
        port - 0 or 1
        period - pulse repetition period in microseconds.

      • getPulseWidthOutputTime

        double getPulseWidthOutputTime(int port)
        Gets the pulse width for the channel output in units of 1 microsecond.
        Parameters:
        port - 0 or 1
        Returns:
        time pulse width for the channel in microseconds.

      • getPulseWidthPeriod

        double getPulseWidthPeriod(int port)
        Gets the pulse repetition period for the channel output in units of 1 microsecond.
        Parameters:
        port - 0 or 1
        Returns:
        period pulse repetition period in microseconds.
